Class GameState

java.lang.Object
GameState
public class GameState extends Object
A class the represents the state of the game, and is statically updated by the ClientHandler class. Hold references to the players, deck, and discard pile as well as other information pretaining to that.
Version:
May 24, 2022
Author:
Angela Chung, Ritam Chakraborty

    Constructs a new deck and discard pile.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState()
      Constructs a new deck and discard pile. Initializes other fields.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(String username)
      Adds a player with the provided username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to add
      Returns:
      true if the game hasn't started and if the maximum number of players hasn't been reached, false otherwise

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer​(String username)
      Gets a player with the specified username
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player
      Returns:
      the player with the specified username, null if the username isn't in the list of players

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(String username)
      Removes player with a specified username
      Parameters:
      username - username of specified player, then fixes the turn system

    • playerWon

      public void playerWon​(String username)
      Adds player to the players that have already won, removes player from the game, player determined from specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the specified player

    • getPlaceOfPlayer

      public int getPlaceOfPlayer​(String username)
      Gets the place in the game of the player with the sepcified username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player
      Returns:
      the place of that player, -1 if the player doesn't exist

    • advanceTurn

      public void advanceTurn​(Card card)
      Advances to the next players turn based on the card that was played.
      Parameters:
      card - the card that was played previously

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the player who's turn is currently going on.
      Returns:
      player who's turn it is

    • gameHasStarted

      public boolean gameHasStarted()
      Determines whether the game has started or not.
      Returns:
      true if game has started, false if otherwise

    • getPlayerList

      public String getPlayerList()
      Gets the list of players in string format.
      Returns:
      the list of players in string format

    • getLastPlayedCard

      public Card getLastPlayedCard()

    • play

      public boolean play​(Card card, int index)
      Plays the specified card with the specified index in the players hand, if they are able to play the card.
      Parameters:
      card - card they should play
      index - index of card to play
      Returns:
      true if the player could play the card, false otherwise

    • draw

      public Card draw()
      Draws a card from the deck if they are allowed to draw.
      Returns:
      the card that they drew if they were permitted to draw, null if they were not.

    • getTotalPlayers

      public int getTotalPlayers()
      Gets the amount of players currently in the game.
      Returns:
      amount of players in the game

    • saidUno

      public void saidUno​(String username)
      Called when someone says uno. Distributes cards depending on who said it.
      Parameters:
      username - username of player who said uno

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game.
